casebody.data:
[Civ. No. 3947. Third Appellate District. December 30, 1929.] GEORGE BOWERS, as Administrator, etc., Appellant, v. O. O. PUTNAM et al., Respondents. (Two Cases.)

*799Frank A. Duryea for Appellant.

A. G-. King, Theodore W. Chester and Downey & Chester for Respondents.

THE COURT.

Application to take additional evidence herein is denied upon the authority of Tupman v. Haberkern, 208 Cal. 256, 280 Pac. 970.
